attributes.review: This app seemed like it was all fun in games at the start, but soon I decided I HATED the app. I then was going to rate it a one star rating. However, just when I touched the small single star, a demon came out of my phone an attacked me! It left scars all across my face and I am currently in the hospital writing this review. I eventually figured out how to get the demon to not come out. You just have to leave bad reviews on multiple devices and it will get bored of you and stop coming. Trust me, it works! attributes.title: BAD Devil Spawn

attributes.review: I got this app in response to the overwhelming support that was present in Tulsa . For example him getting enough supporters in the first place when we now have candidates like Kanye who is set on marking the country government equivalent to a fictional African country that came for the imagination of 2 white men. Honestly I hope they fix the application as quickly as they can before November.
